r.d:
This extension implements a Z39.50 client for PHP using the YAZ toolkit.
Find more information at: http://www.indexdata.dk/phpyaz/ http://www.indexdata.dk/yaz/
r.n: Updates for YAZ 2.0.29 and later. Fixed in charset conversion code that avoids bad ODR memory ref. Force first argument ref for yaz_wait. Not second. Patch by Jakub Vrana. Specify version in zend_module_entry.
